item.title: 中国恒大清盘听证会因寻求新债务协议而延期
item.description:
Summary:
  • Evergrande winding-up hearing adjourned until Dec 4翻译:恒大清盘听证会延期至12月4日
  • Judge says delay will be the last before decision is made翻译:法官表示延迟将是做出决定前的最后一次
  • Evergrande plans to monetise two listed units in revised plan翻译:恒大计划在修订计划中将两个上市单位货币化
  • Evergrande reaches out with new plan in past weeks - bondholders翻译:恒大在过去几周公布了新计划-债券持有人
  • Logan Group winding-up hearing also adjourned to Dec 4翻译:Logan Group 清盘听证会也延期至 12 月 4 日

A Hong Kong court gave China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) a five week reprieve to come up deal with creditors or face liquidation after the embattled developer said on Monday it was working on a revised debt restructuring plan.翻译:陷入困境的中国恒大集团（3333.HK）周一表示正在制定修订后的债务重组计划，香港一家法院给予该公司五周的缓刑，以与债权人达成协议，否则将面临清算。

The Hong Kong High Court agreed to further adjourn a hearing to wind up Evergrande to Dec. 4, with Justice Linda Chan saying the next hearing would be the last before a decision is made on liquidating the company.翻译:香港高等法院同意将恒大清盘听证会进一步推迟至12月4日，法官陈嘉欣表示，下一次听证会将是做出清算公司决定之前的最后一次听证会。

Evergrande needed to come up with a "concrete" revised restructuring proposal before that date, she said, otherwise it was likely the firm would be wound up.翻译:她表示，恒大需要在此日期之前提出“具体”的修订后的重组方案，否则该公司可能会被清盘。

Evergrande, which has more than $300 billion of liabilities, defaulted on its offshore debt in late 2021 and became the poster child of a debt crisis that has since engulfed China's property sector.翻译:负债超过3000亿美元的恒大集团于2021年底出现境外债务违约，成为席卷中国房地产业的债务危机的典型代表。

Evergrande had been working on a $23 billion offshore debt restructuring plan which was thrown off course last month when its billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan was confirmed to be under investigation for suspected criminal activities.翻译:恒大一直在制定一项230亿美元的离岸债务重组计划，上个月该计划因亿万富翁创始人许家印被证实因涉嫌犯罪活动而接受调查而被打乱。

Due to an investigation into its flagship property unit, Evergrande was barred by mainland regulators from issuing new dollar bonds, a crucial part of the restructuring plan.翻译:由于对其旗舰房地产部门进行调查，恒大被内地监管机构禁止发行新的美元债券，这是重组计划的重要组成部分。

Evergrande's lawyer told the court on Monday the company plans to "monetise the value" of its two Hong Kong-listed units.翻译:恒大的律师周一告诉法庭，该公司计划将其两家在香港上市的子公司“价值货币化”。

Evergrande has reached out to some bondholders with a new restructuring plan in the past two weeks, two sources said.翻译:两名消息人士称，过去两周，恒大已向一些债券持有人提出了新的重组计划。

The revised plan would allow bondholders to swap their bonds into equity and bonds tied to two listed subsidiaries, Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) and Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group (0708.HK). Any proposal no longer includes new notes to be issued by China Evergrande, they added.翻译:修订后的计划将允许债券持有人将其债券转换为与恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）和恒大新能源汽车集团（0708.HK）这两家上市子公司挂钩的股权和债券。他们补充说，任何提案都不再包括中国恒大将发行的新票据。

Evergrande did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:恒大没有回应置评请求。

'NO BETTER OPTION'

The company's shares closed down 9.8% on Monday, having fallen as much as 23% in the morning session before the adjournment.翻译:该公司股价周一收盘下跌 9.8%，休会前早盘跌幅高达 23%。

China's property sector accounts for about a quarter of the activity in the world's second-largest economy. Its woes have rattled global markets and prompted a slew of measures by Beijing to reassure investors and homeowners.翻译:中国的房地产业约占世界第二大经济体经济活动的四分之一。它的困境震惊了全球市场，并促使北京采取一系列措施安抚投资者和房主。

A liquidation of Evergrande, which listed total assets of $240 billion as at end-June, would send further shockwaves through already fragile capital markets, but is expected to have little immediate impact on the company's operations, including its many home construction projects.翻译:恒大截至6月底的总资产为2400亿美元，其清算将给本已脆弱的资本市场带来进一步冲击，但预计不会对该公司的运营（包括其许多住宅建设项目）产生直接影响。

"The company has been given a very clear message by the court that this is the last chance to propose a viable restructuring plan that is acceptable to the creditors," Neil McDonald, a Kirkland Ellis partner who represents the major bondholder group, told Reuters.翻译:代表主要债券持有人团体的柯克兰埃利斯合伙人尼尔·麦克唐纳对路透社表示：“法院向该公司发出了非常明确的信息，这是提出债权人可以接受的可行重组计划的最后机会。”

A lawyer for the bondholders group told the court they supported the adjournment, because a restructuring plan could have a higher recovery rate for creditors than a liquidation scenario of less than 3%.翻译:债券持有人团体的一名律师告诉法庭，他们支持延期，因为重组计划可能比清算方案为债权人带来更高的回收率（低于 3%）。

Top Shine, an investor in Evergrande unit Fangchebao, filed the winding-up petition in June 2022 because it said Evergrande had not honoured an agreement to repurchase shares the investor bought in the unit.翻译:恒大旗下房车宝的投资者Top Shine于2022年6月提交了清盘申请，因为该公司表示恒大没有履行回购该投资者在该子公司购买的股份的协议。

LOGAN LIQUIDATION

Fellow property developer Logan Group's (3380.HK) winding up order was also adjourned by the same court to Dec 4.翻译:同为房地产开发商的龙光集团（3380.HK）的清盘令也被同一法院推迟至12月4日。

The Shenzhen-based company said last year it would suspend interest payments and restructure its offshore debt including $3.7 billion in dollar bonds due to liquidity pressure.翻译:这家总部位于深圳的公司去年表示，由于流动性压力，将暂停支付利息并重组其离岸债务，其中包括 37 亿美元的美元债券。

Little progress has been made on the restructuring talks since the company said in March it started negotiations with offshore creditors to agree with proposed restructuring terms, bondholders told Reuters.翻译:债券持有人告诉路透社，自该公司三月份表示开始与境外债权人谈判以就拟议的重组条款达成一致以来，重组谈判几乎没有取得任何进展。

Logan did not respond to request for comment.翻译:洛根没有回应置评请求。

Logan and two of its subsidiaries received a winding-up petition in Nov 2022 filed by the bond trustee who represents a few investors holding the 5.75% 2025 bond.翻译:Logan 及其两家子公司于 2022 年 11 月收到了债券受托人提交的清盘申请，该受托人代表持有 5.75% 2025 年债券的少数投资者。

Reporting by Clare Jim and Xie Yu in Hong Kong; Additional reporting by Scott Murdoch in Sydney; Editing by Lincoln Feast and Miral Fahmy翻译:Clare Jim 和 Xie Yu 在香港的报道；斯科特·默多克在悉尼的补充报道；林肯·费斯特和米拉尔·法赫米编辑

item.title: 独家：美军开始采购日本海鲜以对抗中国禁令
item.description:
The United States has for the first time begun buying Japanese seafood to supply its military there, a response to China's ban on such products imposed after Tokyo released treated water from its crippled Fukushima nuclear plant into the sea.翻译:美国首次开始购买日本海鲜供应其军队，这是对东京将受损的福岛核电站处理过的水排入大海后中国实施的此类产品禁令的回应。

Unveiling the initiative in a Reuters interview on Monday, U.S. ambassador to Japan Rahm Emanuel said Washington should also look more broadly into how it could help offset China's ban that he said was part of its "economic wars".翻译:美国驻日本大使拉姆·伊曼纽尔周一在接受路透社采访时宣布了这一举措，他表示华盛顿还应该更广泛地研究如何帮助抵消中国的禁令，他称这是其“经济战”的一部分。

China, which had been the biggest buyer of Japanese seafood, says its ban is due to food safety fears.翻译:中国曾是日本海鲜的最大买家，表示其禁令是出于对食品安全的担忧。

The U.N.'s nuclear watchdog vouched for the safety of the water release that began in August from the plant wrecked by a 2011 tsunami. G7 trade ministers on Sunday called for the immediate repeal of bans on Japanese food.翻译:联合国核监督机构保证了 2011 年海啸毁坏核电站从 8 月份开始放水的安全性。七国集团贸易部长周日呼吁立即废除对日本食品的禁令。

"It's going to be a long-term contract between the U.S. armed forces and the fisheries and co-ops here in Japan," Emanuel said.翻译:伊曼纽尔说：“这将是美国武装部队与日本渔业和合作社之间的长期合同。”

"The best way we have proven in all the instances to kind of wear out China's economic coercion is come to the aid and assistance of the targeted country or industry," he said.翻译:他说：“我们在所有情况下都证明，消除中国经济胁迫的最佳方式是向目标国家或行业提供援助和协助。”

The first purchase involves just shy of a metric ton of scallops, a tiny fraction of more than 100,000 tons of scallops that Japan exported to mainland China last year.翻译:第一批采购的扇贝数量不到一吨，与去年日本向中国大陆出口的超过10万吨扇贝相比，只是微不足道的一部分。

Emanuel said the purchases - which will feed soldiers in messes and aboard vessels as well as being sold in shops and restaurants on military bases - will increase over time to all types of seafood. The U.S. military had not previously bought local seafood in Japan, he said.翻译:伊曼纽尔表示，随着时间的推移，所有类型的海鲜的采购量将增加，这些采购量将为食堂和船上的士兵提供食物，并在军事基地的商店和餐馆出售。他说，美军此前没有购买过日本当地的海鲜。

The U.S. could also look at its overall fish imports from Japan and China, he said. The U.S. is also in talks with Japanese authorities to help direct locally caught scallops to U.S.-registered processors.翻译:他说，美国还可以考虑从日本和中国进口的鱼类总量。美国还在与日本当局进行谈判，以帮助将当地捕获的扇贝送往在美国注册的加工商。

'NOT A CHINA HAWK'

Emanuel, who was former U.S. President Barack Obama's White House chief of staff, has in recent months made a series of blunt statements on China, taking aim at various issues including its economic policies, opaque decision-making and treatment of foreign firms.翻译:曾任美国前总统奥巴马的白宫办公厅主任伊曼纽尔近几个月针对中国发表了一系列直言不讳的言论，矛头直指中国的经济政策、决策不透明、外国企业待遇等问题。

That has come as top U.S. officials, including Secretary of State Antony Blinken, have visited Beijing in an effort to draw a line under strained ties.翻译:在此之前，包括国务卿安东尼·布林肯在内的美国高级官员已访问北京，试图与紧张的关系划清界限。

Asked if he considered himself hawkish on China, Emanuel rejected the term and said he was a "realist".翻译:当被问及他是否认为自己对中国持强硬态度时，伊曼纽尔拒绝了这个说法，并表示他是一个“现实主义者”。

"I don't consider it hawkish but just consider it realist and honest. Maybe the honesty is painful, but it's honest," he said.翻译:“我不认为这是鹰派，而是认为它是现实和诚实的。也许诚实是痛苦的，但它是诚实的，”他说。

"I'm all for stability, understanding. That doesn't mean you're not honest. They're not contradictory. One of the ways you establish stability, is that you're able to be honest with each other."翻译:“我完全支持稳定和理解。这并不意味着你不诚实。它们并不矛盾。建立稳定的方法之一就是你们能够彼此诚实。”

He said China faced major economic challenges exacerbated by a leadership intent on turning their backs on international systems.翻译:他表示，中国面临重大经济挑战，而领导层有意背弃国际体系，加剧了这一挑战。

"The kind of loser in this is the youth of China. You now have a situation where 30% of the Chinese youth, one out of three, are unemployed. You have major cities with unfinished housing ... you have major municipalities not able to pay city workers. Why? Because China made a political decision to turn their back on a system in which they were benefiting."翻译:“这方面的输家是中国的年轻人。现在的情况是，30%的中国年轻人，即三分之一，失业。主要城市的住房未完工……主要城市无法完成住房建设。”向城市工人支付工资。为什么？因为中国做出了一项政治决定，放弃了他们从中受益的制度。”

The most recent official youth unemployment data from China, published in July before Beijing said it was suspending publication of the numbers, showed it jumping to a record high of 21.3%.翻译:中国最新的官方青年失业率数据显示，该数据跃升至 21.3% 的历史新高。

Emanuel said he was also keeping a close watch on how China's leadership responds to the recent death of former Premier Li Keqiang, a reformist who was sidelined by President Xi Jinping.翻译:伊曼纽尔表示，他还在密切关注中国领导层如何应对前总理李克强最近的去世。李克强是一名被国家主席习近平排挤的改革派人士。

"What's ... interesting to me, that I think is telltale, is how they will be treating his funeral and how they'll be treating comments about him," he said.翻译:“对我来说……有趣的是，我认为这很能说明问题，他们将如何对待他的葬礼，以及他们将如何对待有关他的评论，”他说。

"I do think that there's kind of a section of China that sees what kind of policies he was pursuing as kind of the best of China. But that's up for China to decide."翻译:“我确实认为，中国有一部分人认为他所奉行的政策是中国最好的政策。但这要由中国决定。”

Editing by Robert Birsel翻译:罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑
item.author: John Geddie, Yukiko Toyoda

item.title: 中国将派科技部副部长出席英国全球人工智能峰会--消息人士
item.description:
China will send Wu Zhaohui, a Vice Minister of Science and Technology, to a global summit on artificial intelligence this week in Britain, two sources familiar with the matter said.翻译:两位知情人士称，中国将派科技部副部长吴朝晖参加本周在英国举行的全球人工智能峰会。

Britain is bringing together representatives of AI companies, political leaders and experts on Nov. 1-2 to discuss what some see as the risks posed by the technology, with an aim of building an international consensus on its safe development.翻译:英国将于 11 月 1 日至 2 日召集人工智能公司代表、政治领导人和专家讨论一些人认为该技术带来的风险，旨在就其安全发展达成国际共识。

China last week accepted Britain's invitation to attend the summit, in another sign of thawing relations, after Britain's top diplomat James Cleverly visited Beijing in August in the first trip by a British foreign secretary in five years.翻译:继英国最高外交官詹姆斯·克莱弗利 (James Cleverly) 于八月访问北京，这是英国外交大臣五年来首次访问北京后，中国上周接受了英国出席峰会的邀请，这是两国关系解冻的又一迹象。

Britain is trying to improve ties with China after the relationship sunk to its lowest point in decades under former Prime Minister Boris Johnson, when London restricted some Chinese investment over national security worries and expressed concern over a crackdown on freedoms in Hong Kong.翻译:英国正试图改善与中国的关系，此前英国在前首相鲍里斯·约翰逊(Boris Johnson)的领导下，两国关系跌至数十年来的最低点，当时伦敦出于国家安全担忧限制了一些中国投资，并对香港自由受到打压表示担忧。

Visits to China by senior British civil servants and former officials have increased in recent months. Former Prime Minister Tony Blair visited Beijing earlier this month and met Chinese Foreign Minister Wang Yi, as Beijing seeks to boost ties with the Labour party ahead of a general election likely next year.翻译:近几个月来，英国高级公务员和前官员访华次数有所增加。前首相托尼·布莱尔本月早些时候访问了北京，并会见了中国外交部长王毅，北京方面寻求在明年可能举行的大选之前加强与工党的关系。

Wu will be joined by representatives from the Chinese foreign ministry, companies and academic bodies including the Chinese Academy of Sciences, Alibaba (9988.HK) and Tencent (0700.HK), according to one of the sources, who declined to be identified as the information remained confidential.翻译:据一位不愿透露姓名的消息人士称，吴先生将与中国外交部、中国科学院、阿里巴巴（9988.HK）和腾讯（0700.HK）等公司和学术机构的代表一起出席。该信息仍然保密。

Alibaba, Tencent and Britain's Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office did not respond immediately to requests for comment. China's science ministry and foreign ministry, as well as the Chinese Academy of Sciences, did not respond immediately to faxed requests for comment.翻译:阿里巴巴、腾讯和英国外交、联邦和发展办公室没有立即回应置评请求。中国科学部、外交部以及中国科学院没有立即回复传真置评请求。

Wu was appointed to his role in the science ministry in December 2022. China is restructuring the ministry to channel more resources into achieving scientific breakthroughs, with a goal of moving faster towards self-reliance.翻译:吴于 2022 年 12 月被任命担任科学部职务。中国正在重组该部，以投入更多资源来实现科学突破，目标是更快地实现自力更生。

The other source said that President Xi Jinping had initially been invited, adding that there had been a big discussion over whether Britain should invite any Chinese officials. "But eventually the view was taken that to not invite China would be counter-productive," the source said. They also declined to be named as the information was confidential.翻译:另一位消息人士称，习近平主席最初受到了邀请，并补充说，英国是否应该邀请任何中国官员进行了激烈的讨论。 “但最终人们认为不邀请中国会适得其反，”消息人士称。由于信息保密，他们也拒绝透露姓名。

Like many countries around the world, China has been caught up in a global craze over generative AI following the popularity of OpenAI's ChatGPT last year.翻译:与世界上许多国家一样，继去年 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 流行之后，中国也卷入了全球生成式人工智能的热潮。

China now has at least 130 large language models launched by companies including Alibaba and Tencent, accounting for 40% of the global total and just behind the United States' 50% share, according to brokerage CLSA.翻译:据券商里昂证券(CLSA)称，中国目前至少有130个由阿里巴巴、腾讯等公司推出的大型语言模型，占全球总数的40%，仅落后于美国50%的份额。

Reporting by Laurie Chen in Beijing and Brenda Goh in Shanghai; editing by Miral Fahmy翻译:Laurie Chen 在北京和 Brenda Goh 在上海的报道；米拉尔·法赫米 编辑
item.author: Laurie Chen, Brenda Goh

item.title: 美国和中国数据公布前油价下跌 1%
item.description:
Oil prices slipped more than 1% on Monday as investors adopted caution ahead of a U.S. Federal Reserve policy meeting and China's manufacturing data due this week, offsetting support from tension in the Middle East.翻译:周一油价下跌逾 1%，因投资者在美联储政策会议和本周公布的中国制造业数据之前采取谨慎态度，抵消了中东紧张局势带来的支撑。

Brent crude futures dropped 1%, or 97 cents, to $89.51 a barrel by 0718 GMT, while U.S. West Texas Intermediate crude was down 1.3%, or $1.13, at $84.41 a barrel.翻译:截至 GMT 0718，布伦特原油期货下跌 1%，即 97 美分，至每桶 89.51 美元，而美国西德克萨斯中质原油下跌 1.3%，即 1.13 美元，至每桶 84.41 美元。

"Despite an escalation in the Hamas-Israel war, the ground invasion was widely expected," said CMC Markets analyst Tina Teng.翻译:CMC Markets分析师蒂娜·滕（Tina Teng）表示：“尽管哈马斯与以色列的战争升级，但人们普遍预计会发生地面入侵。”

"The weekend playout signals no further expansion into a wider regional war, which caused a retreat in oil prices."翻译:“周末的局势表明，地区战争不会进一步扩大，导致油价下跌。”

Both Brent and WTI had ended Friday up 3% after Israel stepped up ground incursions into Gaza, stoking worries that the conflict could widen in a region that accounts for a third of global oil production.翻译:以色列加强对加沙的地面入侵后，布伦特原油和 WTI 周五均上涨 3%，引发了人们对这一占全球石油产量三分之一的地区冲突可能扩大的担忧。

Investors are watching for the outcome of Wednesday's U.S. Fed meeting, U.S. jobs data and earnings from tech giant Apple Inc (AAPL.O) for signs of any economic slowdown that could affect fuel demand in the world's top oil consumer.翻译:投资者正在关注周三美联储会议的结果、美国就业数据以及科技巨头苹果公司(AAPL.O)的财报，以寻找可能影响全球最大石油消费国燃料需求的任何经济放缓迹象。

The Fed is widely expected to keep interest rates unchanged, however, while the central banks of Britain and Japan are also set to review their policies.翻译:然而，人们普遍预计美联储将维持利率不变，而英国和日本央行也将重新审视其政策。

China will report its October manufacturing and services PMIs this week, with investors looking out for more signs that the economy of the world's top crude importer is stabilising and fuel demand is improving after supportive measures by Beijing.翻译:中国将于本周公布 10 月份制造业和服务业采购经理人指数，投资者正在寻找更多迹象，表明在北京采取支持性措施后，世界最大原油进口国的经济正在企稳，燃料需求正在改善。

As developments in the Middle East keep investors on edge and prices volatile, Brent and WTI fell on the week last week, for the first time in three weeks.翻译:由于中东事态发展令投资者紧张且价格波动，布伦特原油和西德克萨斯中质原油上周出现三周来首次下跌。

"But the weekend showed the armed conflict remains limited to Israel and Gaza," said Vandana Hari, founder of oil market analysis provider Vanda Insights. "In that light, crude looks overbought. I expect it to continue sliding."翻译:石油市场分析提供商 Vanda Insights 的创始人万达纳·哈里 (Vandana Hari) 表示：“但周末的情况表明，武装冲突仍然仅限于以色列和加沙。” “从这个角度来看，原油价格看起来已经超买了。我预计它会继续下滑。”

On Monday, Palestinians in northern Gaza reported fierce air and artillery strikes as Israeli troops backed by tanks pressed into the enclave with a ground assault that spurred more international calls to protect civilians.翻译:周一，加沙北部的巴勒斯坦人报告说，以色列军队在坦克的支援下，对加沙地带发动地面攻击，遭到猛烈的空袭和炮击，这引发了更多国际社会呼吁保护平民。

item.title: 俄罗斯总统绍伊古指责西方试图将乌克兰战争扩大到亚太地区
item.description:
Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu said the West wants to expand the conflict in the Ukraine to the Asia-Pacific region, Russian state media reported, citing comments made at a Beijing defence forum on Monday.翻译:据俄罗斯官方媒体报道，俄罗斯国防部长绍伊古周一在北京防务论坛上发表评论称，西方希望将乌克兰冲突扩大到亚太地区。

Speaking at the Xiangshan Forum, China's biggest military diplomacy event, Shoigu said NATO is covering up a build-up of forces in the Asia-Pacific region with an "ostentatious desire for dialogue", Russia's TASS news agency reported.翻译:据俄罗斯塔斯社报道，绍伊古在中国最大的军事外交活动香山论坛上发表讲话时表示，北约正在以“夸张的对话愿望”来掩盖在亚太地区的军力集结。

Shoigu said NATO countries were promoting an arms race in the region, increasing their military presence and the frequency and scale of military drills there.翻译:绍伊古表示，北约国家正在推动该地区的军备竞赛，增加在该地区的军事存在以及军事演习的频率和规模。

U.S. forces will use information exchanges with Tokyo and Seoul on missile launches to deter Russia and China, Shoigu said. He also accused Washington of trying to use climate change and natural disasters as an excuse for "humanitarian interventions".翻译:绍伊古表示，美军将利用与东京和首尔交换导弹发射信息来威慑俄罗斯和中国。他还指责华盛顿试图利用气候变化和自然灾害作为“人道主义干预”的借口。

Shoigu said the emergence of new security blocs such as the Quad and AUKUS undermined the role of the Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) and nuclear non-proliferation efforts in the region.翻译:绍伊古表示，Quad 和 AUKUS 等新安全集团的出现削弱了东南亚国家联盟（ASEAN）的作用以及该地区的核不扩散努力。

At the same time, he said, Russia's move to revoke its ratification of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treaty did not mean the end of the agreement, and Russia was not lowering its threshold for the use of nuclear weapons.翻译:同时，他表示，俄罗斯撤销对《全面禁止核试验条约》的批准并不意味着该协议的结束，俄罗斯也没有降低使用核武器的门槛。

"We are only seeking to restore parity with the United States, who have not ratified this treaty," Russia's RIA news agency quoted Shoigu as saying. "We are not talking about its destruction."翻译:俄罗斯RIA通讯社援引绍伊古的话说：“我们只是寻求恢复与尚未批准该条约的美国的平等。” “我们不是在谈论它的毁灭。”

Shoigu said that Moscow was ready for talks on the post-conflict settlement of the Ukraine crisis on further 'co-existence' with the West, but that Western countries needed to stop seeking Russia's strategic defeat.翻译:绍伊古表示，莫斯科准备就冲突后解决乌克兰危机、与西方进一步“共存”进行谈判，但西方国家需要停止寻求俄罗斯的战略失败。

Making clear the conditions for such talks were not in place yet, Shoigu said: "It is also important to ensure equal relations between all the nuclear powers and permanent United Nations Security Council members who carry special responsibility for upholding peace and global stability."翻译:绍伊古明确表示此类会谈的条件尚未具备：“确保所有核大国与对维护和平与全球稳定负有特殊责任的联合国安理会常任理事国之间的平等关系也很重要。”

Reporting by Lidia Kelly in Sydney; Writing by Liz Lee and Laurie Chen in Beijing and Olzhas Auyezov in Almaty; Editing by Christopher Cushing and Gerry Doyle翻译:莉迪亚·凯利 (Lidia Kelly) 悉尼报道； Liz Lee 和 Laurie Chen 在北京撰写，Olzhas Auyezov 在阿拉木图撰写；克里斯托弗·库欣和格里·多伊尔编辑

item.title: 在繁忙的央行数据密集的一周之前，美元维持在 150 日元附近
item.description:
The dollar held steady in cautious trade on Monday and pinned the yen near 150 as traders looked to a policy decision by the Bank of Japan later in the week, alongside other major central bank meetings and a slew of economic data releases globally.翻译:周一，美元在谨慎交易中保持稳定，并将日元固定在 150 附近，因为交易员关注本周晚些时候日本央行的政策决定，以及其他主要央行会议和全球发布的一系列经济数据。

The BOJ kicks off its two-day monetary policy meeting on Monday, leading a week which will also see interest rate decisions from the U.S. Federal Reserve and the Bank of England.翻译:日本央行将于周一开始为期两天的货币政策会议，本周美联储和英国央行也将做出利率决定。

A PMI data deluge, inflation figures in the euro zone and U.S. nonfarm payrolls also add to the mix of the event-packed week.翻译:大量的采购经理人指数数据、欧元区通胀数据和美国非农就业数据也为本周的事件增添了色彩。

"It's definitely a busy week," said Carol Kong, a currency strategist at Commonwealth Bank of Australia.翻译:澳大利亚联邦银行货币策略师卡罗尔·孔表示：“这绝对是忙碌的一周。”

"The BOJ meeting will be the most interesting one (given) heightened speculation over a policy tweak at this meeting."翻译:“鉴于对这次会议上政策调整的猜测加剧，日本央行会议将是最有趣的一次。”

The yen was little changed at 149.58 per dollar, getting a slight reprieve after having struck a one-year trough of 150.78 per dollar last week.翻译:日元兑美元汇率几乎没有变化，为149.58，在上周触及150.78的一年低点后略有缓解。

A recent surge in global interest rates has heightened pressure on the BOJ to change its bond yield control, as speculation mounts that the dovish central bank could hike its existing yield cap at this week's meeting.翻译:最近全球利率飙升加大了日本央行改变债券收益率控制的压力，因为人们猜测鸽派央行可能会在本周的会议上提高现有收益率上限。

"Our base case remains that the BOJ will leave its monetary policy settings unchanged, although we acknowledge that there is a risk that they will announce tweaks to its yield curve control programme," said Kong.翻译:孔说：“我们的基本情况仍然是日本央行将保持其货币政策设置不变，尽管我们承认他们有可能宣布调整其收益率曲线控制计划。”

In the broader market, currency moves were largely subdued as traders stayed on guard and risk sentiment remained fragile.翻译:在更广泛的市场中，由于交易员保持警惕且风险情绪依然脆弱，货币走势基本受到抑制。

The Australian and New Zealand dollars nudged higher after having slid to fresh 2023 lows last week, with the Aussie last up 0.32% at $0.63545.翻译:澳元和新西兰元在上周跌至 2023 年新低后小幅走高，澳元兑美元最后上涨 0.32%，至 0.63545 美元。

The kiwi gained 0.28% to $0.5825.翻译:新西兰元上涨 0.28% 至 0.5825 美元。

Palestinians in northern Gaza reported fierce air and artillery strikes early on Monday as Israeli troops backed by tanks pressed into the enclave with a ground assault that prompted more international calls for civilians to be protected.翻译:加沙北部的巴勒斯坦人周一早些时候报告称，以色列军队在坦克的支援下，对加沙地带进行了猛烈的空袭和炮击，并进行地面攻击，这促使国际社会更多地呼吁保护平民。

"The geopolitical backdrop in the Middle East remains a dominant market consideration," said Chris Weston, head of research at Pepperstone.翻译:Pepperstone 研究主管 Chris Weston 表示：“中东的地缘政治背景仍然是市场的主要考虑因素。”

U.S. RATES

Against the dollar, sterling fell 0.02% to $1.21195, while the euro slipped 0.02% to $1.0563.翻译:英镑兑美元下跌0.02%至1.21195美元，欧元兑美元下跌0.02%至1.0563美元。

The dollar index steadied at 106.57, as investors assessed what the recent run of resilient U.S. economic data would mean for the Fed's rate outlook.翻译:美元指数稳定在106.57，投资者评估近期强劲的美国经济数据对美联储利率前景的影响。

Data on Friday showed U.S. consumer spending surged in September as households boosted purchases of motor vehicles and travelled, keeping spending on a higher growth path heading into the fourth quarter.翻译:周五的数据显示，随着家庭增加汽车购买量和出行，美国 9 月份消费者支出激增，使支出在进入第四季度时保持较高增长。

While expectations are for the Fed to leave interest rates on hold when it announces its policy decision later in the week, markets are pricing in a roughly 19% chance of a hike in December, according to the CME FedWatch tool.翻译:尽管预计美联储在本周晚些时候宣布政策决定时将维持利率不变，但根据 CME FedWatch 工具，市场预计 12 月加息的可能性约为 19%。

"While the Fed will certainly not provide forward guidance in the classical sense at the upcoming meeting, it has already provided some helpful information on its interpretation of recent developments: a more balanced view of risks," said Christian Scherrmann, U.S. economist at DWS.翻译:“虽然美联储肯定不会在即将举行的会议上提供传统意义上的前瞻性指引，但它已经就其对近期事态发展的解释提供了一些有用的信息：对风险更加平衡的看法，”DWS美国经济学家克里斯蒂安·谢尔曼(Christian Scherrmann)表示。

"The question is how the decision to hold rates will be communicated this time, especially as the Fed is not yet in a position to declare victory on inflation."翻译:“问题是这次将如何传达维持利率的决定，特别是在美联储尚未能宣布通胀胜利的情况下。”

Reporting by Rae Wee; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:Rae Wee 报道；穆拉利库马尔·阿南塔拉曼编辑

item.title: COP28 主席和团体敦促到 2030 年将可再生能源发电量增加两倍
item.description:
The presidency of next month's COP28 climate summit and two renewable energy organisations on Monday urged governments to triple renewable energy capacity by 2030 as part of efforts to stop global warming exceeding 1.5 degrees Celsius.翻译:下个月的 COP28 气候峰会主席国和两个可再生能源组织周一敦促各国政府到 2030 年将可再生能源产能增加两倍，作为阻止全球变暖超过 1.5 摄氏度的努力的一部分。

Countries hope to strike a deal on the increase in capacity at the latest round of global climate negotiations set to get under way in Dubai in late November, which will focus on the gaps in the implementation of the 2015 Paris Agreement that established the 1.5°C ceiling.翻译:各国希望在定于 11 月底在迪拜举行的最新一轮全球气候谈判中就增加产能达成协议，该谈判将重点关注 2015 年《巴黎协定》的实施中的差距，该协定确立了 1.5°C 的目标天花板。

Renewable energy capacity needs "to reach more than 11,000 GW" by 2030, the United Arab Emirates' COP28 presidency, the International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA) and the Global Renewables Alliance said in a joint report.翻译:COP28 主席国阿拉伯联合酋长国、国际可再生​​能源机构 (IRENA) 和全球可再生能源联盟在一份联合报告中表示，到 2030 年，可再生能源容量需要“达到 11,000 吉瓦以上”。

Most major economies are already on board with that goal. Group of 20 nations, among them China, the United States and India, agreed in September to pursue efforts to triple global renewable energy capacity by 2030.翻译:大多数主要经济体已经实现了这一目标。包括中国、美国和印度在内的 20 国集团于 9 月同意努力到 2030 年将全球可再生能源产能增加两倍。

Without rapid action to cut CO2 emissions, scientists say Earth will cross the 1.5°C threshold in the coming decade, unleashing far more severe climate change effects on people, wildlife and ecosystems.翻译:科学家表示，如果不迅速采取行动减少二氧化碳排放，地球温度将在未来十年内突破 1.5°C 的门槛，从而对人类、野生动物和生态系统造成更加严重的气候变化影响。

However, striking a deal among the nearly 200 countries that attend COP28 meetings will not be easy. European nations and climate-vulnerable states argue that it is not enough to agree to scale up clean energy, if countries do not also agree to quit the polluting energy that is causing climate change.翻译:然而，参加 COP28 会议的近 200 个国家之间达成协议并不容易。欧洲国家和气候脆弱国家认为，如果各国不同意退出导致气候变化的污染能源，仅仅同意扩大清洁能源规模是不够的。

They say a renewable energy deal at COP28 must be paired with a commitment to phase out CO2-emitting fossil fuels - a pledge that has faced resistance from Saudi Arabia, Russia and other fossil fuel-reliant economies.翻译:他们表示，COP28 上的可再生能源协议必须与逐步淘汰排放二氧化碳的化石燃料的承诺相结合，这一承诺遭到了沙特阿拉伯、俄罗斯和其他依赖化石燃料的经济体的抵制。

"You cannot just have the renewables goal and then call the COP a success," European Union climate policy chief Wopke Hoekstra told an event in Brussels on Friday.翻译:欧盟气候政策负责人沃普克·霍克斯特拉 (Wopke Hoekstra) 周五在布鲁塞尔举行的一次活动中表示：“你不能只实现可再生能源目标，然后就称缔约方会议取得成功。”

Guiding the COP28 talks will be the UAE's Sultan al-Jaber, a choice that has drawn criticism from some U.S. and EU lawmakers as well as campaigners as he is the boss of state oil giant ADNOC, and the UAE's climate envoy.翻译:指导 COP28 谈判的将是阿联酋的苏丹贾比尔，这一选择引起了一些美国和欧盟立法者以及活动人士的批评，因为他是国有石油巨头阿布扎比国家石油公司的老板，也是阿联酋的气候特使。

The report also called for doubling energy efficiency, urging targets with specific time frames, strong regulatory frameworks, financial incentives and awareness campaigns.翻译:该报告还呼吁将能源效率提高一倍，敦促制定具体的时间框架、强有力的监管框架、财政激励措施和宣传活动。

Reporting by Yousef Saba and Kate Abnett, editing by Deborah Kyvrikosaios翻译:由 Yousef Saba 和 Kate Abnett 报道，Deborah Kyvrikosaios 编辑

item.title: 早间买盘：中东麻烦中市场保持镇定
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.翻译:韦恩·科尔 (Wayne Cole) 对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。

It's been a cautious start in Asian markets as Israeli troops backed by tanks pressed into northern Gaza with a ground assault that drew increased international calls for the protection of civilians.翻译:亚洲市场的开局十分谨慎，以色列军队在坦克的支持下向加沙北部发动地面攻击，引起了国际社会越来越多的保护平民的呼声。

Yet, oil prices have actually slipped and U.S. equity futures are firmer, suggesting investors are wagering the conflict will not widen or hamper oil supplies, at least for the moment.翻译:然而，油价实际上已经下滑，美国股指期货走强，这表明投资者押注冲突不会扩大或阻碍石油供应，至少目前如此。

The Nikkei (.N225) has taken the biggest hit, in part due to speculation the Bank of Japan might tweak, or even abandon, its yield curve control policy when a two-day policy meeting ends on Tuesday.翻译:日经指数（.N225）遭受的打击最大，部分原因是人们猜测日本央行可能会在周二为期两天的政策会议结束时调整甚至放弃其收益率曲线控制政策。

The central bank is considered almost certain to nudge up its inflation forecasts, but analysts are divided on whether it will act to allow 10-year bond yields to rise further given it spent billions last week to hold them below 1%.翻译:人们认为央行几乎肯定会上调通胀预期，但鉴于央行上周斥资数十亿美元将10年期国债收益率控制在1%以下，分析师对其是否会采取行动允许10年期国债收益率进一步上升存在分歧。

Yields were up at 0.88% on Monday having climbed 11 basis points so far this month, a major move for the market, and there is pressure on the BOJ to raise the cap further or widen the trading band for yields.翻译:收益率周一上涨 0.88%，本月迄今已上涨 11 个基点，这是市场的重大举措，日本央行面临进一步提高上限或扩大收益率交易区间的压力。

Most talk is it will stay on hold this time, but will discuss laying the groundwork for an eventual shift.翻译:大多数讨论是这一次将被搁置，但将讨论为最终转变奠定基础。

Major financial institutions like Japan's Dai-Ichi Life Insurance project a shift in BOJ policy early next year, and nearly two-thirds of economists polled by Reuters expect the BOJ to end negative rates in 2024.翻译:日本第一生命保险等主要金融机构预计日本央行明年初政策将发生转变，路透社调查的近三分之二的经济学家预计日本央行将在 2024 年结束负利率。

Any tweak would see Japanese yields rise and add to the pain being felt in the Treasury market, where 10-year yields nudged up to 4.87% on Monday with scant sign of any safe haven bid.翻译:任何调整都将导致日本国债收益率上升，并加剧美国国债市场的痛苦。周一，美国国债市场 10 年期国债收益率微升至 4.87%，但几乎没有任何避险买盘的迹象。

Instead, dealers are fretting over how much new issuance Treasury will announce at its refunding this week, with an increase almost certain given the government's borrowing needs.翻译:相反，交易商们担心财政部本周将在退款时宣布新发行多少债券，考虑到政府的借贷需求，发行量几乎肯定会增加。

Analysts at NatWest Markets expect $885 billion of marketable borrowing in Q4 and $700 billion in Q1. They see increases of $3 billion for 2s, 5s, and 10s, $2 billion for FRNs, 3s and 30s, and $1 billion in 7s, 20s, and 5y and 10y TIPS.翻译:NatWest Markets 分析师预计第四季度的可流通借款为 8,850 亿美元，第一季度为 7,000 亿美元。他们预计2年期、5年期和10年期TIPS将增加30亿美元，FRN、3年期和30年期TIPS将增加20亿美元，7年期、20年期、5年期和10年期TIPS将增加10亿美元。

The announcement on July 31 of $1.007 trillion in funding needs for the third quarter badly spooked the bond market, leading to the sharp increase in auction volumes.翻译:7月31日公布的第三季度融资需求为1.007万亿美元，严重震惊了债券市场，导致拍卖量急剧增加。

It is also notable that the borrowing kept climbing even though the economy surprised everyone with its strength. Nominal GDP growth in the third quarter was a blistering 8.5% annualised, the kind of pace China used to boast of and a pace that would normally be a bonanza for tax receipts.翻译:同样值得注意的是，尽管经济的强劲程度令所有人感到惊讶，但借款仍在持续攀升。第三季度名义GDP年化增长率高达8.5%，这是中国过去常常吹嘘的增速，而且通常会带来税收收入的丰厚增长。

The sharp rise in market borrowing costs has convinced analysts the Federal Reserve will stand pat at its policy meeting this week, with futures implying a 97% chance of rates staying at 5.25-5.5%.翻译:市场借贷成本的急剧上升让分析师确信美联储将在本周的政策会议上按兵不动，期货意味着利率维持在 5.25-5.5% 的可能性有 97%。

The market has also priced in 165 basis points of easing for 2024, starting around mid-year 2024.翻译:市场还预计 2024 年将实施 165 个基点的宽松政策，从 2024 年年中左右开始。

The earnings season also continues this week with Apple (AAPL.O), Airbnb (ABNB.O), McDonald's (MCD.N), Moderna (MRNA.O) and Eli Lilly (LLY.N) among the many reporting. Results so far have been underwhelming, contributing to the S&P 500's (.SPX) retreat into correction territory.翻译:本周财报季仍在继续，苹果(AAPL.O) 、Airbnb (ABNB.O) 、麦当劳(MCD.N) 、Moderna (MRNA.O)和礼来(LLY.N)等众多公司都发布了财报。迄今为止的结果并不令人印象深刻，导致标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)回落至回调区域。

Key developments that could influence markets on Monday:翻译:可能影响周一市场的主要事态发展：

- Bank of Japan begins two-day policy meeting翻译:- 日本央行开始为期两天的政策会议

- German GDP and CPI data, EU business climate翻译:- 德国GDP和CPI数据、欧盟商业景气

- Appearances by ECB Vice President Luis de Guindos and Riksbank Governor Erik Thedéen翻译:- 欧洲央行副行长路易斯·德金多斯和瑞典央行行长埃里克·塞登出席

- Treasury announces borrowing estimates for the fourth quarter and the first quarter of 2024.翻译:- 财政部公布 2024 年第四季度和第一季度的借款预估。

item.title: 中俄在中国军事论坛上瞄准美国
item.description:
Chinese and Russian military chiefs targeted the United States for criticism at a security forum in Beijing on Monday, even as China's second-most-senior military commander vowed to boost defence ties with Washington.翻译:中国和俄罗斯军事领导人周一在北京举行的安全论坛上批评美国，尽管中国第二高级军事指挥官发誓要加强与华盛顿的防务关系。

The lack of regular communications between the U.S. and Chinese militaries has been a persistent worry for Washington amid tensions between the countries and the risk of an accidental clash in the South China Sea or near Taiwan.翻译:在两国关系紧张以及南海或台湾附近发生意外冲突的风险之际，美国和中国军队之间缺乏定期沟通一直是华盛顿的一个担忧。

The Beijing Xiangshan Forum, China's biggest annual show of military diplomacy, began Sunday without the country's defence minister, who typically hosts the event, but included a U.S. delegation amid roiling regional tensions.翻译:北京香山论坛是中国最大的年度军事外交秀，周日在没有中国国防部长的情况下开幕，通常由国防部长主持该活动，但在地区紧张局势加剧之际，美国代表团也参加了会议。

Russia's Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu warned the West that its involvement in the Ukraine war created grave danger.翻译:俄罗斯国防部长谢尔盖·绍伊古警告西方，俄罗斯卷入乌克兰战争将造成严重危险。

"The Western line of steady escalation of the conflict with Russia carries the threat of a direct military clash between nuclear powers, which is fraught with catastrophic consequences," Russia's TASS state news agency cited Shoigu as saying at the forum.翻译:俄罗斯塔斯社国家通讯社援引绍伊古在论坛上的话说：“西方与俄罗斯的冲突不断升级，带来了核大国之间直接军事冲突的威胁，这将带来灾难性后果。”

Shoigu also said the West intends to inflict "strategic defeat" on Russia in a "hybrid war", and praised the model of Russia-China relations as "exemplary", Russian state media reported.翻译:据俄罗斯官方媒体报道，绍伊古还表示，西方打算在一场“混合战争”中对俄罗斯造成“战略失败”，并称赞俄中关系模式是“典范”。

Zhang Youxia, vice chairman under President Xi Jinping on China's Central Military Commission, delivered veiled criticism of the United States and its allies, accusing "some countries" of trying to undermine the government.翻译:中国国家主席习近平领导下的中央军委副主席张又侠对美国及其盟国进行了含蓄的批评，指责“一些国家”试图破坏政府。

But in other parts of his speech, Zhang stressed the need for improved military ties with the United States.翻译:但在讲话的其他部分，张强调了改善与美国军事关系的必要性。

"We will deepen strategic cooperation and coordination with Russia and are willing to, on the basis of mutual respect, peaceful coexistence and win-win cooperation, develop military ties with the U.S.," Zhang said in an address being closely watched by military attaches and diplomats amid tensions over Taiwan and the South China Sea.翻译:张军在讲话中表示，“我们将深化同俄罗斯的战略合作与协调，愿在相互尊重、和平共处、合作共赢的基础上发展同美国的军事关系”。台湾和南海紧张局势中的外交官。

China's defence minister delivered the keynote speech in previous years.翻译:中国国防部长历年都曾发表过主旨演讲。

China and the U.S. have had no high-level military-to-military communications since the Washington-sanctioned former Chinese defence minister, Li Shangfu, was appointed in March.翻译:自华盛顿批准的中国前国防部长李尚福于三月上任以来，中美两国一直没有进行过高层军事交流。

Li was sacked last week without explanation, and China did not name a replacement. Reuters reported last month that Li, who has been missing for two months, was being investigated over corruption.翻译:李上周在没有任何解释的情况下被解雇，中国也没有任命继任者。路透社上个月报道称，失踪两个月的李正因腐败问题接受调查。

The U.S. defence department has sent a delegation led by Cynthia Xanthi Carras, China country director in the Office of the Undersecretary of Defense.翻译:美国国防部派出由国防部副部长办公室中国国家主任辛西娅·克桑西·卡拉斯率领的代表团。

It is not yet known whether the U.S. team will meet separately with Chinese military officials.翻译:目前尚不清楚美国代表团是否会单独会见中国军方官员。

The participation of the U.S. delegation comes as the United States and China ramp up exchanges ahead of an expected summit between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping next month.翻译:美国代表团出席之际，正值美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平下个月举行峰会之前，美国和中国加强了交流。

Last week, China's top diplomat, Wang Yi, met with Biden for an hour in talks the White House described as a "good opportunity" to keep open lines of communication between the two geopolitical rivals.翻译:上周，中国最高外交官王毅与拜登进行了一个小时的会谈，白宫称这是在两个地缘政治对手之间保持开放沟通渠道的“好机会”。

Despite the conciliatory remarks about improving China-U.S. military relations, Zhang and some PLA officers gave no sign of a softer stance on issues such as Taiwan, which Beijing's regards as its own territory.翻译:尽管发表了关于改善中美军事关系的和解言论，但张和一些解放军军官在台湾等问题上没有表现出软弱的立场，北京将台湾视为自己的领土。

Chinese Lieutenant General He Lei, speaking at a panel on Sunday, said that if China has to use force against Taiwan, "it will be a war for reunification, a just and legitimate war".翻译:中国中将何雷周日在一次小组会议上发言时表示，如果中国必须对台湾使用武力，“这将是一场争取统一的战争，一场正义合法的战争”。

In his speech, Zhang said that countries "should not deliberately provoke other countries on major and sensitive issues," he said, adding that Taiwan is "a core interest" of China.翻译:张在讲话中表示，各国“不应在重大敏感问题上故意刺激其他国家”，并补充说台湾是中国的“核心利益”。

Many Western countries have either shunned the forum or are only sending small and low-level delegations, preferring instead to discuss international security issues at the Shangri-La Dialogue, held annually in Singapore.翻译:许多西方国家要么回避这个论坛，要么只派出小规模、低级别的代表团，而宁愿在每年在新加坡举行的香格里拉对话上讨论国际安全问题。

Together with the commission's third-ranked official, He Weidong, Zhang held bilateral meetings with defence ministers from Laos, Mongolia, Belarus, East Timor and Myanmar, according to state media.翻译:据官方媒体报道，张与该委员会的三号官员何卫东一起与老挝、蒙古、白俄罗斯、东帝汶和缅甸的国防部长举行了双边会议。

(This story has been refiled to clarify the speaker's location and trim a quote in paragraph 18)翻译:（这个故事已被重新归档，以澄清说话者的位置并删除第 18 段中的引用）

item.title: 台湾反对派联手参选立法院
item.description:
Taiwan's two main opposition parties said on Monday they will team up for parliamentary elections in January in a bid to win more seats but said more discussions are needed on a joint ticket for a presidential vote.翻译:台湾两个主要反对党周一表示，他们将联手参加一月份的议会选举，以赢得更多席位，但表示需要就总统选举的联合选举进行更多讨论。

Vice President William Lai, the presidential candidate of the ruling Democratic Progressive Party (DPP), has led in most opinion polls, leaving the candidates of the main opposition Kuomintang (KMT), Hou Yu-ih, and the Taiwan People's Party (TPP), Ko Wen-je, to battle it out for second place.翻译:执政党民进党总统候选人、副总统赖清德在大多数民意调查中领先，主要反对党国民党、侯裕义和台湾人民党的候选人落败柯文哲争夺第二名。

The issue of China, which views self-ruled Taiwan as its territory, looms over the Jan. 13 parliamentary and presidential elections. It has stepped up military and political pressure to press the island to accept its sovereignty claim, which Taiwan rejects.翻译:中国将自治的台湾视为其领土，这一问题在 1 月 13 日的议会和总统选举中显得尤为突出。它加大了军事和政治压力，迫使台湾接受其主权主张，但遭到台湾的拒绝。

China cut off a routine talks with Taiwan after President Tsai Ing-wen of the DPP took office in 2016. The two opposition parties have vowed to pursue dialogue with China on an equal and dignified basis and "restore peace and stability in the Taiwan Strait".翻译:2016年民进党总统蔡英文上台后，中国中断了与台湾的例行会谈。两党誓言在平等和有尊严的基础上与中国进行对话，“恢复台海和平稳定” 。

The KMT and TPP, which have been discussing the possibility of teaming up, said after a meeting between their leaders on Monday they would "support each other and maximize seats" in parliament to "deepen democracy".翻译:一直在讨论合作可能性的国民党和跨太平洋党领导人周一会面后表示，他们将在议会中“相互支持并最大化席位”，以“深化民主”。

But in response to questions from reporters about a joint presidential election ticket, the leaders said more discussions were needed to work out a plan on that.翻译:但在回答记者有关联合总统选举票的问题时，领导人表示，需要进行更多讨论才能制定相关计划。

"There were some disputes remaining to be settled," said Ko, a former mayor of the island's capital, Taipei, adding that he wanted a "fair and mutually acceptable" pact with the KMT.翻译:“还有一些争议有待解决，”台湾首府台北市前市长柯说，他补充说，他希望与国民党达成“公平且双方都能接受”的协议。

The KMT has 38 of 113 seats in parliament to the TPP's five.翻译:国民党在议会 113 个席位中拥有 38 个席位，TPP 拥有 5 个席位。

The KMT controls 14 of Taiwan's 22 city mayor and county chief positions, to the TPP's two.翻译:台湾22个市长和县长职位中，国民党控制着14个，而TPP控制着两个。

Reporting by Yimou Lee; editing by Robert Birsel翻译:李亦谋报道；罗伯特·伯塞尔编辑

item.title: 丰田 9 月产量因日本产量强劲而跃升
item.description:
Toyota Motor (7203.T) said on Monday that worldwide production rose 1.5% in September from the same period a year earlier to 900,919 vehicles, boosted by stronger demand in Japan, the United States and in Europe.翻译:丰田汽车(7203.T)周一表示，受日本、美国和欧洲需求强劲的推动，9月份全球产量同比增长1.5%至900,919辆。

The Japanese automaker's domestic production, which accounted for just over a third of the vehicles it produced during the month, rose 12.8% from a year earlier, offsetting a 3.6% decline in overseas output.翻译:这家日本汽车制造商的国内产量占该月汽车产量的三分之一多一点，同比增长 12.8%，抵消了海外产量下降 3.6% 的影响。

The world's biggest automaker by sales reported an 11.6% jump in global sales in September to 921,308 vehicles.翻译:这家全球销量最大的汽车制造商报告称，9 月份全球销量增长 11.6%，达到 921,308 辆。

Its sales and production both hit a record for the month.翻译:当月销量和产量均创历史新高。

Toyota has sold more than 7.5 million vehicles during the first nine months of the year.翻译:今年前 9 个月，丰田汽车销量超过 750 万辆。

The figures include its luxury Lexus brand.翻译:这些数字包括其豪华品牌雷克萨斯。

Domestic sales surged 20.5% in September, while those in the United States rose 14% and sales in Europe were up 18.1%.翻译:9月份国内销量猛增20.5%，美国销量增长14%，欧洲销量增长18.1%。

In contrast, output and sales in Thailand, Indonesia and Vietnam fell in September due to tougher economic conditions.翻译:相比之下，由于经济形势严峻，泰国、印度尼西亚和越南9月份产量和销量均出现下降。

In China, the world's biggest auto market, Toyota reported a nearly 7% decline in production even as it reported slightly higher year-on-year sales.翻译:在全球最大的汽车市场中国，丰田公布的销量同比略有上升，但产量却下降了近7%。

Reporting by Daniel Leussink; Editing by Jamie Freed翻译:丹尼尔·洛辛克报道；杰米·弗里德编辑

item.title: 美国州参议员在香港非法持有枪支罪被判无罪
item.description:
A Hong Kong court acquitted U.S. State Senator Jeff Wilson of illegally possessing a firearm in the Chinese-ruled city as long as he doesn't commit any crime for the next two years.翻译:香港一家法院宣判美国州参议员杰夫·威尔逊在香港非法持有枪支罪名不成立，只要他在未来两年内不犯罪。

Wilson, a member of the Washington State Senate representing the 19th district, was arrested in Hong Kong on Oct. 21 when he arrived at the airport with a pistol in his carry-on luggage. A Republican party member, he has served in the state senate since 2021 and is also a Port of Longview Commissioner.翻译:代表第19选区的华盛顿州参议院议员威尔逊于10月21日在香港被捕，当时他在随身行李中携带手枪，抵达机场。作为一名共和党成员，他自 2021 年以来一直在州参议院任职，同时也是朗维尤港专员。

Hong Kong Principal Magistrate Don So acquitted Wilson of illegal firearms possession and ordered to pay a cash fee of HKD$2,000 ($256), along with the "bind-over order" that requires Wilson to engage in good behaviour and keep the peace for two years.翻译:香港首席裁判官苏东（Don So）宣判威尔逊非法持有枪支罪名不成立，并被责令支付 2,000 港元（256 美元）的现金费用，以及要求威尔逊在两年内行为良好并维持治安的“约束令” 。

So said he was inclined to believe that Wilson did not deliberately break the law.翻译:所以说他倾向于相信威尔逊并没有故意违法。

"This is not the first time he came to Hong Kong or China, he used to be a trade delegate to Hong Kong and China. He should have known that the scrutiny in Hong Kong and China is strict," So said.翻译:“这不是他第一次来香港或中国，他曾经是香港和中国的贸易代表。他应该知道香港和中国的审查很严格，”苏说。

Wilson was travelling with his wife on the first leg of a five week vacation in Southeast Asia. He did a self declaration of arms at customs and he brought a revolver by mistake, the court was told.翻译:威尔逊与妻子一起前往东南亚进行五周假期的第一站。法庭被告知，他在海关进行了自我武器申报，并错误地携带了一把左轮手枪。

He did not realise his pistol was in his briefcase when he passed through airport security in Portland in the U.S. and baggage screeners failed to detect it, he said in a statement on his website.翻译:他在自己网站上的一份声明中表示，当他通过美国波特兰机场安检时，他并没有意识到自己的手枪在公文包里，而且行李安检机也没有发现它。

The weapon was discovered mid-flight between San Francisco and Hong Kong, when he reached into his briefcase for a piece of gum and felt his unloaded revolver inside, the statement said.翻译:声明称，这件武器是在旧金山和香港之间的飞行途中发现的，当时他伸手到公文包里取出一块口香糖，摸到里面有一把已卸下子弹的左轮手枪。

Carrying a firearm without a license in Hong Kong is illegal and offenders can face up to HK$100,000 ($12,800) and a maximum of 14 years in prison.翻译:在香港无证携带枪支是违法的，违法者最高可面临 100,000 港元（12,800 美元）的罚款和最高 14 年的监禁。

Reporting by Dorothy Kam; writing by Farah Master; Editing by James Pomfret and Christian Schmollinger翻译:多萝西·卡姆 (Dorothy Kam) 报道；法拉大师撰写；詹姆斯·庞弗雷特和克里斯蒂安·施莫林格编辑

item.title: 亚洲足球周
item.description:
Talking points from the week in Asian football:翻译:本周亚洲足球的谈话要点：

SHANGHAI PORT WIN CHINESE TITLE AFTER VOLATILE SHANDONG DRAW

Shanghai Port claimed the Chinese Super League title for the first time since 2018 on Sunday, drawing 1-1 with nearest rivals Shandong Taishan in a bad-tempered clash at Pudong Stadium that featured five red cards.翻译:周日，上海港队在浦东体育场与实力最接近的对手山东泰山队进行了一场激烈的交锋，双方共领到五张红牌，自2018年以来首次夺得中超联赛冠军。

Lu Wenjun put Shanghai ahead from close range in the 16th minute but was then sent off four minutes before the interval for a second bookable offence.翻译:第16分钟，吕文君近距离射门帮助上海取得领先，但在中场休息前4分钟因第二次犯规被罚下场。

His expulsion sparked angry scenes that resulted in Shandong's Moises and Cai Huikang also been sent off, while Port coach Javier Pereira also saw red.翻译:他的被驱逐引发了愤怒的场面，导致山东队的莫伊塞斯和蔡惠康也被罚下场，而港口队主教练哈维尔·佩雷拉也被红牌罚下。

Shandong substitute Fei Nanduo was the next to be dismissed 15 minutes from time and, although Xie Wenneng equalised a minute from time, Shanghai held on to clinch the title with one game remaining.翻译:比赛还剩15分钟时，山东替补球员费南多被罚下场，尽管谢文能在比赛还剩一分钟时扳平比分，但上海队在还剩一场的情况下锁定了冠军。

SECOND HALF SHOW SEES ULSAN COMPLETE K-LEAGUE TITLE DEFENCE

Ulsan Hyundai clinched the K-League title on Sunday with a 2-0 win over Daegu FC to ensure the defending champions retained the crown won last year.翻译:蔚山现代队周日以2比0击败大邱F​​C队，夺得K联赛冠军，确保卫冕冠军卫冕冠军。

Ulsan's win coupled with a 1-1 draw for second-placed Pohang Steelers meant Hong Myung-bo's side opened up a 10-point gap over their nearest rivals with three games remaining in the campaign.翻译:蔚山的胜利加上 1-1 战平排名第二的浦项制铁队，意味着洪明甫的球队在联赛还剩 3 场比赛时，与最接近的对手拉开了 10 分的差距。

Kim Min-hyeok gave Ulsan the lead with a 69th minute header and Jang Si-yong put the result beyond doubt in the final minute when he slotted his shot through goalkeeper Oh Seung-hoon's legs.翻译:金珉赫在第 69 分钟头球破门，为蔚山取得领先，张时勇在最后一分钟射门，穿过门将吴承勋的腿，让比赛结果毫无疑问。

ANDERSON LOPES BRACES SEES YOKOHAMA MOVE CLOSER TO SUMMIT

Yokohama F Marinos closed to within two points of J.League leaders Vissel Kobe on Saturday after Kevin Muscat's defending champions handed Avispa Fukuoka a 4-0 defeat.翻译:周六，凯文·穆斯卡特的卫冕冠军福冈黄蜂队以 4-0 击败横滨水手队后，横滨水手队与 J.League 领头羊神户胜利船的差距缩小到两分。

Anderson Lopes scored twice in the opening 25 minutes before further goals from Asahi Uenaka and Ryo Miyaichi confirmed the points for Marinos.翻译:安德森·洛佩斯在开场 25 分钟就梅开二度，随后上中朝日和宫市亮的进球证实了水手队的得分。

Kobe's lead was cut after Takayuki Yoshida's team were held to a 1-1 draw by Shonan Bellmare, with Yuya Osako equalising from the penalty spot in the 53rd minute for the league leaders to score his 21st goal of the campaign.翻译:吉田贵之的球队被湘南贝尔马雷以 1-1 逼平后，神户的领先优势被缩小，第 53 分钟，大迫雄也通过点球扳平比分，为联赛领头羊攻入了本赛季的第 21 粒进球。

MITROVIC ON TARGET AS AL-HILAL REMAIN ON TOP IN SAUDI

Aleksandar Mitrovic scored again as Al-Hilal maintained their lead in the Saudi Pro League with a 3-1 win over Al-Ahli on Saturday.翻译:周六，亚历山大·米特罗维奇再次进球，帮助阿尔希拉尔队以 3-1 战胜阿尔阿赫利队，继续在沙特职业联赛中保持领先。

The former Fulham striker doubled his side's advantage in the 37th minute to net his eighth of the season after Sergej Milinkovic-Savic had given Al-Hilal a first minute lead.翻译:这位前富勒姆前锋在第 37 分钟将球队的优势扩大了一倍，在谢尔盖·米林科维奇-萨维奇 (Sergej Milinkovic-Savic) 在第一分钟为阿尔希拉尔 (Al-Hilal) 取得领先后，打进了本赛季的第八个进球。

Al-Hilal hold a four point advantage over Al-Nassr, who beat Al-Fayha 3-1 to climb above Al-Taawon into second place with Anderson Talisca scoring twice for Luis Castro's team.翻译:Al-Hilal 领先 Al-Nassr 4 分，后者以 3-1 击败 Al-Fayha，超越 Al-Taawon 升至第二位，安德森·塔利斯卡 (Anderson Talisca) 为路易斯·卡斯特罗 (Luis Castro) 队梅开二度。

URAWA UNDER PRESSURE AFTER ASIAN CHAMPIONS LEAGUE DEFEAT

Title holders Urawa Red Diamonds slipped to a 2-0 loss against Pohang Steelers in the Asian Champions League on Wednesday to put their hopes of a place in the last 16 in doubt.翻译:卫冕冠军浦和红钻周三在亚冠联赛中以 2-0 输给浦项制铁，让他们进入 16 强的希望受到质疑。

Urawa are second in Group J, five points behind Pohang and level with China's Wuhan Three Towns, with only the winners guaranteed to advance to the knockout rounds.翻译:浦和在J组排名第二，落后浦项5分，与中国的武汉三镇持平，只有胜者才能晋级淘汰赛。

Pohang, Al-Ain of the United Arab Emirates, Saudi Pro League side Al-Nassr, Bangkok United and Japan's Kawasaki Frontale are the only teams with perfect records as the group phase reached the halfway point.翻译:浦项、阿联酋艾因、沙特职业联赛球队阿尔纳斯尔、曼谷联队和日本川崎前锋队是小组赛过半时仅有的战绩完美的球队。

item.title: G7呼吁立即废除日本食品禁令，向中国施压
item.description:
The Group of Seven (G7) industrial powers called on Sunday for the "immediate repeal" of import curbs on Japanese food products, a reference to China's restrictions after Japan began releasing wastewater from the Fukushima nuclear power plant.翻译:七国集团（G7）工业大国周日呼吁“立即废除”对日本食品的进口限制，指的是日本开始排放福岛核电站废水后中国的限制。

The G7 trade ministers, in a statement after a weekend meeting on Osaka, did not mention China but they also denounced what they consider its rising economic coercion through trade.翻译:七国集团贸易部长在大阪周末会议后发表的一份声明中没有提及中国，但他们也谴责了中国通过贸易日益增强的经济胁迫。

"We deplore actions to weaponize economic dependencies and commit to build on free, fair, and mutually beneficial economic and trade relationships," said the 10-page statement.翻译:这份长达 10 页的声明表示：“我们对将经济依赖武器化的行为表示遗憾，并致力于建立自由、公平和互利的经济和贸易关系。”

China slapped a blanket suspension of Japanese fish imports two months ago when Japan started the release of treated radioactive water from the wrecked Fukushima plant into the Pacific. While Japan and the U.S. have called the curbs unfair, Russia announced a similar restriction earlier this month.翻译:两个月前，当日本开始将受损福岛核电站处理过的放射性水排入太平洋时，中国全面暂停了日本鱼类进口。尽管日本和美国称这些限制措施不公平，但俄罗斯本月早些时候也宣布了类似的限制措施。

In response, China described G7's move as "economic coercion" and urged the G7 not to "stubbornly adhere to double standards" but take practical action to maintain the normal international trade and investment order.翻译:对此，中方将G7此举形容为“经济胁迫”，并敦促G7不要“顽固地坚持双重标准”，而应以实际行动维护正常的国际贸易和投资秩序。

"The G7 members undermine the level playing field and disrupt the security and stability of global production and supply chains," China's embassy in Japan said in a statement late on Sunday.翻译:中国驻日本大使馆周日晚间在一份声明中表示，“七国集团成员破坏了公平竞争环境，破坏了全球生产和供应链的安全与稳定。”

The G7 - the United States, Japan, Germany, Britain, France, Italy and Canada - expressed "concern" over recent control measures on the export of critical minerals.翻译:七国集团——美国、日本、德国、英国、法国、意大利和加拿大——对最近关键矿产出口控制措施表示“担忧”。

China, the world's top graphite producer, this month announced export curbs on the key material, used in electric vehicle batteries, in another bid to control critical mineral supply in response to challenges over its global manufacturing dominance.翻译:全球最大的石墨生产国中国本月宣布对用于电动汽车电池的关键材料实施出口限制，这是控制关键矿物供应的又一举措，以应对其全球制造业主导地位面临的挑战。

The G7 ministers "shared the need, a genuinely strong one, to reduce dependence on a particular country" for the supply of critical resources, said Yasutoshi Nishimura, trade minister of the host Japan. "We completely agreed to build resilient and reliable supply chains" for critical minerals, semiconductors and batteries, he told a press conference.翻译:东道国日本贸易大臣西村康稔表示，七国集团部长们“一致认为，需要减少对特定国家供应关键资源的依赖，这是真正强烈的需要”。他在新闻发布会上表示，“我们完全同意为关键矿物、半导体和电池建立有弹性和可靠的供应链”。

The ministers reaffirmed their concerns on "a wide and evolving range of non-market policies" that include "pervasive, opaque and trade-distortive industrial subsidies" and forced technology transfer, the statement said.翻译:声明称，部长们重申了他们对“广泛且不断演变的非市场政策”的担忧，其中包括“普遍、不透明和扭曲贸易的工业补贴”和强制技术转让。

On Russia, the G7 officials condemned its destruction of Ukrainian grain export infrastructure in its invasion of the country, and Moscow's decision to "unilaterally" leave talks on an agreement that had allowed grain giant Ukraine to export wheat and other products through the Black Sea.翻译:关于俄罗斯，七国集团官员谴责俄罗斯入侵乌克兰时破坏了乌克兰粮食出口基础设施，并谴责莫斯科决定“单方面”退出一项允许粮食巨头乌克兰通过黑海出口小麦和其他产品的协议谈判。

Unlike the G7 finance ministers' meeting two weeks ago, which condemned "terror attacks" on Israel by Hamas, the trade ministers did not mention the Middle East crisis, saying only that they "seek to raise awareness about the challenges of moving humanitarian goods across international borders during natural disasters and other emergencies".翻译:与两周前谴责哈马斯对以色列的“恐怖袭击”的七国集团财长会议不同，贸易部长们没有提及中东危机，只是表示他们“寻求提高人们对运送人道主义物资所面临挑战的认识”。自然灾害和其他紧急情况期间的国际边界”。

Western countries have generally backed what they say is Israel's right to self-defence, but there has been mounting international concern over the toll from Israel's bombing and growing calls for a pause to allow aid to reach Palestinian civilians in Gaza.翻译:西方国家普遍支持他们所说的以色列的自卫权，但国际社会对以色列轰炸造成的人员伤亡越来越关注，并且越来越多的人呼吁暂停向加沙的巴勒斯坦平民提供援助。

Reporting by Kantaro Komiya; Additional reporting by Liz Lee in Beijing; Editing by William Mallard and Lincoln Feast.翻译:小宫贯太郎报道； Liz Lee 在北京的补充报道；威廉·马拉德和林肯·费斯特编辑。

item.title: 北京马拉松选手不戴口罩，不受雾霾困扰
item.description:
Runners undeterred by thick smog engulfing the Chinese capital ran the Beijing Marathon maskless on Sunday, many wearing shorts in one of the warmest Octobers on record.翻译:周日，在有记录以来最温暖的十月之一，跑者们没有被席卷中国首都的浓雾吓倒，没有戴口罩参加北京马拉松比赛，许多人都穿着短裤。

Despite a greyish brown smog settling, some 30,000 marathoners set off at 7:30 a.m. (2330 GMT) from Tiananmen Square on the route through four districts of the Chinese capital over 42.195 km (26.2 miles).翻译:尽管灰棕色烟雾逐渐消散，约 30,000 名马拉松运动员仍于早上 7:30（格林威治标准时间 2330）从天安门广场出发，路线穿过中国首都的四个区，全程超过 42.195 公里（26.2 英里）。

Beijing was the second most-polluted major city in the world on Sunday, according to Swiss air-quality technology firm IQAir.翻译:根据瑞士空气质量技术公司 IQAir 的数据，周日北京是世界上污染第二严重的主要城市。

In the Haidian district on Beijing's outskirts, the sky looked dreary, but hikers and visitors showed up at the Fragrant Hills Park where many go to enjoy autumn foliage, according to a Reuters witness.翻译:据路透社目击者称，在北京郊区的海淀区，天空显得沉闷，但徒步旅行者和游客出现在香山公园，许多人去那里欣赏秋叶。

China's national forecaster advised the public to wear masks, warning on Sunday morning that air quality was reaching moderate or severe pollution.翻译:中国国家预报员建议公众戴口罩，并在周日早上警告说，空气质量已达到中度或重度污染。

Smog and fog will blanket parts of China for the next few days, reducing visibility and affecting travel in northeastern, northern, central and some eastern provinces, the National Meteorological Center said on Sunday.翻译:国家气象中心周日表示，未来几天，我国部分地区将出现雾霾天气，能见度降低，影响东北、华北、中部和部分东部省份的出行。

Beijing's observatory cautioned in the evening that visibility in most areas of the city will drop to less than 1 km (0.62 mile) overnight.翻译:北京气象台晚间警告说，夜间该市大部分地区的能见度将降至不到 1 公里（0.62 英里）。

The smoggy weather is expected to gradually weaken and dissipate from Friday, but not before heavy fog forecast to cover parts of Jiangsu, Anhui and Sichuan provinces over the next three days could reduce visibility to less than 200 metres (650 feet), the forecaster said.翻译:预报员称，雾霾天气预计从周五开始逐渐减弱并消散，但预计未来三天江苏、安徽和四川省部分地区将出现大雾，能见度可能降至200米（650英尺）以下。

Steel production hubs in Tangshan, Handan and other cities in the northern province of Hebei launched emergency responses on Friday after heavy air pollution forecasts. The notices did not indicate when the controls would be lifted.翻译:在空气污染严重的预报后，唐山、邯郸和河北省其他城市的钢铁生产中心周五启动了应急响应。通知没有表明何时取消控制。

The smog adds unusually warm October weather, due to significantly weaker cold air currents from the north as the polar vortex that sends cold air southward was situated further north recently, experts said.翻译:专家表示，由于向南输送冷空气的极地涡旋最近位于更北的位置，来自北方的冷气流明显减弱，雾霾使十月的天气变得异常温暖。

Beijing's high on Sunday was 19 C (66 F), according to the national weather bureau.翻译:据国家气象局称，周日北京最高气温为 19 摄氏度（66 华氏度）。

Parts of China, including in the north and northeast, have been experiencing temperatures 2 to 4 degrees Celsius (4-7 Fahrenheit) higher than normal the past 10 days.翻译:过去 10 天，中国部分地区，包括北部和东北部，气温比正常水平高 2 至 4 摄氏度（4 至 7 华氏度）。

"At present, a total of 237 national meteorological stations have broken historically highest temperatures in late October, which is still a relatively rare situation," meteorological bureau's chief forecaster Fang Chong was quoted by state media as saying.翻译:官方媒体援引气象局首席预报员方冲的话说：“目前，共有237个国家气象站在10月下旬突破了历史最高气温，这仍然是比较罕见的情况。”

Weak cold air currents were forecast to last the rest of the month before beginning to cool in early November.翻译:预计弱冷气流将持续本月剩余时间，然后在 11 月初开始降温。

While the smog was expected to clear up in less than a week, the backdrop of hazy weather resembled that of Beijing's annual race almost a decade ago. In 2014 then-Premier Li Keqiang, who died on Friday, declared "war" on pollution and many marathoners donned masks for protection.翻译:虽然雾霾预计将在不到一周的时间内消散，但雾霾天气的背景与近十年前北京一年一度的赛事相似。 2014年，周五去世的时任总理李克强向污染宣战，许多马拉松运动员都戴上了口罩进行防护。

Reporting by Liz Lee翻译:莉兹·李报道 and Ryan Woo; Additional reporting by Han Xiao and Bernard Orr; Editing by William Mallard翻译:Liz Lee 和 Ryan Woo 的报道；韩晓和伯纳德·奥尔的补充报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 中国在国防部长缺席的情况下启动香山论坛
item.description:
Beijing Xiangshan Forum, China's biggest annual show of military diplomacy, started on Sunday, although the Asian power is still missing a defence minister, who typically hosts this event.翻译:中国最大的年度军事外交盛会——北京香山论坛于周日开幕，尽管这个亚洲强国仍然缺少通常主办这一活动的国防部长。

China hopes to use the forum to promote President Xi Jinping's vision for a safer world and draw developing countries closer, as it faces increased coordination between the United States and its allies to curtail its military ambitions.翻译:中国希望利用该论坛来宣传习近平主席关于建设更安全世界的愿景，并拉近发展中国家的距离，因为中国面临着美国与其盟友加强协调以遏制其军事野心的情况。

Russian Defence Minister Sergei Shoigu was initially listed in the forum's agenda as the first guest speaker at Monday's opening ceremony, a sign that suggests China intends to give Russia, which invaded in Ukraine in 2022, centre stage at the forum. But as of Sunday, Shoigu’s name was not on the agenda.翻译:俄罗斯国防部长谢尔盖·绍伊古最初被列入论坛议程，成为周一开幕式的第一位演讲嘉宾，这一迹象表明，中国打算让2022年入侵乌克兰的俄罗斯成为论坛的中心舞台。但截至周日，绍伊古的名字并未出现在议程上。

The U.S. defence department has sent a delegation led by Xanthi Carras, China country director in the Office of the Undersecretary of Defense.翻译:美国国防部派出由国防部副部长办公室中国国家主任克桑西·卡拉斯率领的代表团。

This year's forum takes place at an awkward time for China, when it is without a defence minister, whose main role is to engage with foreign militaries.翻译:今年的论坛是在中国一个尴尬的时刻举行的，因为中国没有国防部长，而国防部长的主要职责是与外国军队接触。

On Tuesday, Beijing sacked defence minister Li Shangfu but did not name a replacement. Reuters reported last month that Li, who has been missing for two months, was being investigated for corruption.翻译:周二，北京解除了国防部长李尚福的职务，但没有任命继任者。路透社上个月报道称，失踪两个月的李正因腐败问题接受调查。

Chinese military leaders more senior than the defence minister have filled in for Li. State media reported that Zhang Youxia and He Weidong, ranked number two and three in the military, separately held bilateral meetings with the defence ministers from Laos, Mongolia and Vietnam on Saturday.翻译:比国防部长更高级的中国军方领导人已接替李的职务。官方媒体报道称，军中排名第二和第三的张又侠和何卫东周六分别与老挝、蒙古和越南国防部长举行了双边会晤。

Zhang is due to make a speech at a dinner reception on Sunday and also give the keynote address on Monday, a task performed by the defence minister in previous years.翻译:张计划于周日的晚宴上发表讲话，并于周一发表主旨演讲，这是往年由国防部长承担的任务。

State news agency Xinhua reported that the number and level of foreign participants, including 22 defence ministers and 14 military chiefs, are the highest this year since the forum was first held in 2006.翻译:据新华社报道，今年论坛的外国参会人数和级别是自2006年首次举办以来的最高水平，其中包括22名国防部长和14名军方领导人。

In particular, China is focusing its outreach to the Global South.翻译:特别是，中国正在重点向南半球国家拓展业务。

Zhao Yufei, an official with the event organiser, said the forum will call on developing countries to oppose bloc confrontation and a "Cold War mentality", which are two frequent criticisms Beijing have of the West.翻译:活动主办方官员赵宇飞表示，论坛将呼吁发展中国家反对集团对抗和“冷战思维”，这是北京经常批评西方的两个方面。

Two defence diplomats whose countries have sent ministers told Reuters the forum offers a rare opportunity to engage with senior Chinese defence officials and military leaders to build trust, which would be key in times of crisis.翻译:两名派出部长的国家的国防外交官告诉路透社，该论坛提供了与中国高级国防官员和军事领导人接触以建立信任的难得机会，这在危机时期至关重要。

Concerned about how open the forum can be, many in the West have either shunned it or are only sending small and low-level delegations, preferring instead to discuss international security issues at the Shangri-La Dialogue held annually in Singapore.翻译:由于担心该论坛的开放程度，许多西方国家要么回避它，要么只派出小规模、低级别的代表团，而宁愿在每年在新加坡举行的香格里拉对话上讨论国际安全问题。

Some European countries, including France, plan to send a small delegation from their defence ministries, according to sources familiar with the matter.翻译:据知情人士透露，包括法国在内的一些欧洲国家计划派遣其国防部长组成的小型代表团。

NATO's delegation will be led by Wendin Smith, its security policy director, a NATO official said.翻译:北约官员表示，北约代表团将由其安全政策主任温丁·史密斯率领。

Reporting by Yew Lun Tian and Laurie Chen, additional reporting by Philip Blenkinsop in Brussels翻译:Yew Lun Tian 和 Laurie Chen 的报道，Philip Blenkinsop 在布鲁塞尔的补充报道

item.title: 中国官方媒体报道中国党代表团访问所罗门群岛
item.description:
A Chinese communist party delegation has visited the Solomon Islands, calling the "flourishing" cooperation between China and the Pacific nation a show of how diplomatic ties were in their peoples' interest, Chinese state media said on Sunday.翻译:中国官方媒体周日称，中国共产党代表团访问了所罗门群岛，称中国与这个太平洋国家之间“蓬勃发展”的合作表明，外交关系符合两国人民的利益。

The delegation led by the deputy head of the international department under China's Communist Party central committee, Guo Yezhou, met Solomon Islands' Prime Minister Manasseh Sogavare during a visit spanning Friday to Sunday. The delegation also met the foreign minister and energy minister.翻译:中共中央对外联络部副部长郭业洲率代表团于周五至周日访问所罗门群岛，会见了总理索加瓦雷。代表团还会见了外交部长和能源部长。

China had signed a policing pact with the Solomon Islands in July, as both countries upgraded their ties to a "comprehensive strategic partnership" when Sogavare met Chinese Premier Li Qiang in Beijing.翻译:今年7月，索加瓦雷在北京会见中国总理李强，中国与所罗门群岛签署了警务协议，两国将关系升级为“全面战略伙伴关系”。

China's visit to the southern Pacific archipelago comes a week before Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese is set to visit Beijing.翻译:中国对南太平洋群岛的访问是在澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内塞访问北京之前一周进行的。

In June, Sogavare called for a review of its security treaty with Australia, which has historically provided policing support to the Solomon Islands.翻译:六月，索加瓦雷呼吁审查与澳大利亚的安全条约，澳大利亚历来为所罗门群岛提供警务支持。

The Solomon Islands' security pact with China had also alarmed the United States, which responded saying it was committed to a strong relationship with the region and strengthening longstanding bonds with the people of the Solomon Islands.翻译:所罗门群岛与中国的安全协定也引起了美国的警惕，美国回应说，它致力于与该地区建立牢固的关系，并加强与所罗门群岛人民的长期联系。

Reporting by Liz Lee翻译:莉兹·李报道; Additional reporting by Beijing newsroom

item.title: 中国外长表示习拜登峰会之路不会一帆风顺
item.description:
China's Foreign Minister Wang Yi said the "road to the San Francisco summit will not be a smooth one", the foreign ministry said on Sunday, in a reference to an expected meeting between President Xi Jinping and U.S. President Joe Biden.翻译:中国外交部周日表示，中国外交部长王毅在提到习近平主席和美国总统拜登预计举行的会晤时表示，“通往旧金山峰会的道路不会一帆风顺”。

Wang met Biden and his top aides in Washington in recent days, agreeing to work together toward the expected bilateral meeting on the sidelines of an Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum summit.翻译:王最近几天在华盛顿会见了拜登及其高级助手，同意共同努力，推动亚太经济合作论坛峰会期间举行的双边会晤。

A flurry of bilateral diplomatic engagements in recent months, largely at U.S. request, has aimed at salvaging what were rapidly deteriorating ties early in the year following the U.S. downing of an alleged Chinese spy balloon.翻译:近几个月来，主要是应美国要求，一系列双边外交接触旨在挽救年初美国击落所谓的中国间谍气球后迅速恶化的关系。

But in remarks on Saturday, Wang cautioned the road to the summit would not be a smooth one and travelling there would not be on "autopilot", the ministry said in a statement.翻译:但外交部在一份声明中表示，王在周六的讲话中警告说，通往峰会的道路不会一帆风顺，前往那里的旅行也不会“自动驾驶”。

He was speaking after a discussion with members of the U.S. strategic community in Washington, the ministry said.翻译:该部表示，他是在华盛顿与美国战略界成员讨论后发表上述言论的。

Last month, China's top security agency suggested any Xi-Biden meeting in San Francisco hinged on the U.S. "showing sufficient sincerity".翻译:上个月，中国最高安全机构表示，习拜登在旧金山举行的任何会晤都取决于美国“表现出足够的诚意”。

Wang said China and the U.S. needed to "return to Bali", referring to the last meeting between Biden and Xi, on the sidelines of a Group of 20 summit on the Indonesian resort island last November, where they discussed Taiwan, competition and communication.翻译:王说，中国和美国需要“回到巴厘岛”，指的是拜登和习近平去年11月在印度尼西亚度假岛屿举行的20国集团峰会间隙举行的最后一次会面，当时他们讨论了台湾、竞争和沟通问题。

Washington and Beijing must put into practice the consensus achieved then, "remove interference, overcome obstacles, enhance consensus and gather outcomes", Wang said.翻译:华盛顿和北京必须将双方达成的共识落到实处，“排除干扰，克服障碍，凝聚共识，凝聚成果”。

He said both sides have jointly sent out positive signals to stabilise and improve relations, believing it is useful and necessary to maintain dialogue even as there are still various differences and contradictions, and issues to be resolved.翻译:他表示，双方共同发出了稳定和改善关系的积极信号，认为在仍存在各种分歧矛盾和问题有待解决的情况下，保持对话是有益的、必要的。

Saturday's discussions also included in-depth exchanges on the interaction between China and U.S. militaries, finance, science and technology, China's investment environment and market access, as well as the Middle East and Ukraine crises.翻译:周六的讨论还包括就中美两军互动、金融科技、中国投资环境和市场准入以及中东和乌克兰危机等问题进行了深入交流。

Reporting by Liz Lee翻译:莉兹·李报道; Editing by William Mallard翻译:丽兹·李报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: 美中同意为预期的拜登-习近平峰会而努力
item.description:
The U.S. and China have agreed to work together toward an expected summit between presidents Joe Biden and Xi Jinping next month, U.S. officials said on Friday, following hours of meetings between Chinese foreign minister Wang Yi and senior U.S. diplomats in Washington.翻译:在中国外交部长王毅与美国高级外交官在华盛顿进行了数小时的会晤后，美国官员周五表示，美国和中国已同意共同努力，推动拜登总统和习近平总统下个月举行峰会。

In the first visit by a Chinese foreign minister to Washington since 2018, veteran diplomat Wang Yi also met Biden for an hour, talks that the White House described as a "good opportunity" in keeping lines of communication open between the two geopolitical rivals with deep policy differences.翻译:这是中国外长自 2018 年以来首次访问华盛顿，资深外交官王毅也与拜登进行了一个小时的会面，白宫称这次会谈是保持两个地缘政治对手之间沟通渠道畅通的“好机会”。政策差异。

Wang's meetings with U.S. Secretary of State Antony Blinken and U.S. national security advisor Jake Sullivan spanning over two days totaled nine hours, U.S. officials said, describing these interactions as "candid and in-depth".翻译:美国官员表示，王毅与美国国务卿布林肯和国家安全顾问杰克·沙利文的会面历时两天，总计九个小时，并称这些互动“坦诚而深入”。

Biden's top aides raised Washington's key concerns: the need to restore military-to-military channels between the two countries, Beijing's actions in the East and South China Sea, Taiwan, human rights, the flow of fentanyl precursors and the cases of Americans detained in China, U.S. officials said.翻译:拜登的高级助手提出了华盛顿的主要关切：恢复两国之间军事渠道的必要性、北京在东海和南海的行动、台湾、人权、芬太尼前体的流动以及在美国被拘留的美国人案件。美国官员称，中国。

There were also "frank exchanges" between Blinken and Wang over the erupting conflict in the Middle East.翻译:布林肯和王之间还就中东爆发的冲突进行了“坦诚的交流”。

The key area that appeared to show some positive momentum was toward an expected meeting between Biden and Xi on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit next month in San Francisco.翻译:似乎显示出一些积极势头的关键领域是拜登和习近平预计将于下个月在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织（APEC）峰会期间举行会晤。

"We are making preparations for such a meeting," said one of the senior administration officials briefing reporters on condition of anonymity. "Obviously, Chinese leaders often confirm publicly much closer to a trip, so I will leave it to the Chinese side to figure out if and when they make that announcement," the official said.翻译:一位不愿透露姓名的高级政府官员向记者介绍说：“我们正在为这样的会议做准备。”这位官员表示：“显然，中国领导人经常会公开确认即将进行的访问，因此我将让中方决定是否以及何时宣布这一消息。”

Wang told Biden that the objective of his visit was to help "stem the decline" in U.S.-China ties "with an eye on San Francisco", without giving any details, according to a brief statement from the Chinese foreign ministry.翻译:根据中国外交部的一份简短声明，王告诉拜登，他此行的目的是“着眼于旧金山”，帮助“遏制”美中关系的下滑，但没有透露任何细节。

The foreign ministry readouts for Wang's meetings with Blinken and Sullivan said that "both sides agreed to work together to achieve a meeting between the two heads of state in San Francisco."翻译:外交部通报王毅与布林肯和沙利文会晤的消息称，“双方同意共同努力，促成两国元首在旧金山举行会晤”。

"China attaches importance to the U.S. side's hopes of stabilizing and improving U.S. ties with China," Wang was quoted as saying in his meeting with Biden.翻译:王毅在会见拜登时表示，中方重视美方稳定和改善美中关系的愿望。

The Biden administration has seen direct leader-level engagement with Xi as particularly important in managing tensions as it seeks to prevent relations from veering into conflict.翻译:拜登政府认为，与习近平的领导人直接接触对于管理紧张局势尤为重要，因为它试图防止关系陷入冲突。

"A big part of a potential meeting would be the two leaders sitting down together and having those conversations on strategic intent," the U.S. official said.翻译:这位美国官员表示：“潜在会议的一个重要部分将是两位领导人坐在一起，就战略意图进行对话。”

On Thursday, Wang told Blinken that the two countries have disagreements and need "in-depth" and "comprehensive" dialogue to reduce misunderstandings and stabilize ties. "Not only should we resume dialogue, the dialogue should be in-depth and comprehensive," Wang said.翻译:周四，王告诉布林肯，两国存在分歧，需要“深入”和“全面”对话，以减少误解并稳定关系。王说：“我们不仅应该恢复对话，而且对话应该深入、全面。”

Wang's three-day visit follows a flurry of bilateral diplomatic engagements in recent months, largely at U.S. request, aimed at salvaging what were rapidly deteriorating ties early in the year following the U.S. downing of an alleged Chinese spy balloon.翻译:在王毅进行为期三天的访问之前，近几个月主要应美国要求进行了一系列双边外交接触，旨在挽救年初美国击落所谓的中国间谍气球后迅速恶化的两国关系。

But some in Washington have questioned whether a slate of mostly unreciprocated U.S. cabinet-level official visits to Beijing over the past six months, including by Blinken, Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen and Commerce Secretary Gina Raimondo, played into Beijing's hand.翻译:但华盛顿的一些人质疑，过去六个月美国内阁级官员对北京进行的一系列几乎没有回应的正式访问，包括布林肯、财政部长珍妮特·耶伦和商务部长吉娜·雷蒙多，是否对北京有利。

The trips by Yellen and Raimondo led to new bilateral economic and commercial working groups, which critics worry will only pull U.S. focus away from - and possibly delay - sanctions, export controls and broader measures intended to enhance U.S. competition with China.翻译:耶伦和雷蒙多的访问促成了新的双边经济和商业工作组的成立，批评人士担心，这只会将美国的注意力从制裁、出口管制和旨在加强美国与中国竞争的更广泛措施上转移，甚至可能推迟。

U.S. officials have maintained that increased diplomacy does not mean a let up in policy.翻译:美国官员坚称，加强外交并不意味着放松政策。

CONCERN OVER MIDDLE EAST

The Israel-Hamas conflict has added a fresh dynamic to the testy relationship between the superpowers, and Washington is hoping Beijing can use its influence with Iran to prevent an escalation into a wider war in the Middle East.翻译:以色列与哈马斯的冲突给超级大国之间紧张的关系增添了新的动力，华盛顿希望北京能够利用其对伊朗的影响力，防止中东地区的战争升级为更广泛的战争。

U.S. officials said the issue came up frequently during Wang's meetings but it was unclear whether Washington was able to get Beijing on board to commit to using its influence to help contain the conflict.翻译:美国官员表示，这个问题在王毅的会议上经常被提及，但目前尚不清楚华盛顿是否能够让北京方面承诺利用其影响力帮助遏制冲突。

"We expressed our deep concern with the situation and pressed China to take a more constructive approach, and that would include, of course, their engagements with the Iranians, to urge calm," another of the senior administration officials said.翻译:另一位政府高级官员表示：“我们对局势表示深切关注，并敦促中国采取更具建设性的做法，其中当然包括与伊朗人接触，以敦促各方保持冷静。”

China has condemned violence and attacks on civilians in the conflict, and while Wang has declared Israel's actions "beyond the scope of self-defense" he has not named Hamas in his comments.翻译:中国谴责冲突中针对平民的暴力和袭击，虽然王宣称以色列的行动“超出自卫范围”，但他在评论中没有点名哈马斯。

The second official said Blinken raised U.S. concerns about China’s recent actions in the South China Sea and the East China Sea, including its “dangerous and unlawful obstruction” of the Philippine resupply mission to Second Thomas Shoal in the South China Sea and its unsafe intercept of a U.S. aircraft.翻译:第二名官员表示，布林肯提出了美国对中国最近在南海和东海的行动的担忧，包括“危险且非法地阻碍”菲律宾在南海仁爱礁的补给任务，以及不安全拦截菲律宾的补给任务。一架美国飞机。
